Literature.Title: Structural determinants of antimicrobial and antiplasmodial activity and selectivity in histidine-rich amphipathic cationic peptides.
Literature.Author: Mason AJ, Moussaoui W, Abdelrahman T, Boukhari A, Bertani P, Marquette A, Shooshtarizaheh P, Moulay G, Boehm N, Guerold B, Sawers RJ, Kichler A, Metz-Boutigue MH, Candolfi E, Prévost G, Bechinger B

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=>65.2 µM,Human fibroblasts MRC-5:50% Cell death=20.5±1.3 µM,Human fibroblasts MRC-5 SV2:50% Cell death=18.3±1.9 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli RSO 2(MIC=1.4µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 52156(MIC=4.2µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=>11.2µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=2.8µM),Enterococcus faecalis(MIC=>11.2µM),Plasmodium falciparum(IC50=10.3µM)
